name: generate_code_with_context
description: Intelligently generate or modify code based on user's request. This tool analyzes the project context, identifies relevant files, formulates a plan, and generates complete working code. Use this for any code generation task - it will automatically find and update the right files.

user_request.description: The user's coding request or task description. Be specific about what code needs to be generated or modified.

project_id.description: The Appwrite project ID. Use the value from the conversation context or userId.
